simulator

Class UIData

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.UIData

  • public class UIData
extends java.lang.Object
    UIData holds all data necessary for a UI (both text and graphical based). It provides methods for updating all fields with the latest information and getting that information.

      • getBrokenOnStep

        public java.util.List<PlantComponent> getBrokenOnStep()
        Returns a list of all broken components since last call of step command. Used to print information about components that broke when step was called.
        Returns:
        a list of all broken components since last call of step command.
